title: Unused Code Removal v1.6.2.2
details:
Completed unused code removal for copy-URL-on-hover extension v1.6.2.2:

## Phase 1 - Safe Deletions:
- Deleted `src/utils/browser-api.js` (duplicate of src/core/browser-api.js, no imports)
- Deleted `src/utils/Logger.js` (uppercase, old implementation - lowercase logger.js is used)
- Deleted `src/features/quick-tabs/index.js.backup` (development backup)
- Deleted `src/features/quick-tabs/panel.js.backup-phase2.10` (development backup)
- Deleted `tests/unit/utils/Logger.test.js` (orphaned test for deleted file)
- Added backup patterns to .gitignore: *.backup, *.backup-*, *.bak

## Phase 2 - Config Cleanup:
Removed from DEFAULT_CONFIG in src/core/config.js:
- `quickTabCloseOnOpen` (never implemented)
- `quickTabUpdateRate` (obsolete - now uses Pointer Events)
- `quickTabCustomX` (unused)
- `quickTabCustomY` (unused)

## NOT Removed (has active imports):
- `src/utils/dom.js` - Imported by window.js, ResizeHandle.js, TitlebarBuilder.js

## Results:
- ~3,788 lines removed
- All tests pass (78 suites, 2174 tests)
- Build succeeds
- CodeScene health: 9.68/10
- CodeQL: No alerts
